page.title: 05 PLACES OF INTEREST
page.content: { The White Bear (cont):}further back from the road and a stained glass window commemorates the event. It is a popular drinking place due to its friendly hosts,unusual atmosphere and many live bands. { The Town Hall:}This was built in 1913 at a cost of Â£5000.The money was given by the late first Lord of Masham.In 1917 Lady Masham ran the Town Hall as a convalescent home for soldiers.In the Second World War it was used as a first aid post.It is now used by the whole community for various social events, the Parish Council,Youth Clubs and other clubs. { The Recreation Ground:}is a large expanse of ground near the river.It was given by Lord Masham as a memorial to those who died in 1914-1918 war. It is used as a popular play area and has football,hockey,bowls,tennis &(cont)
